description.value:
This wad of green slime looks like a mass of jelly, but when worn on the head, you can Interact to style it into hair-do-like fashions. While worn, rivulets of green liquid slowly dribble into your ears and down your forehead and neck, making it uncomfortable to use long-term.

Slough-do grants you a +2 item bonus to Occultism checks, and allows you to cast the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Adhere] cantrip as an occult innate spell.

Additionally, you can activate the tactical slough-do.

Activateâ€”Slough-Do Swirl Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect The slough-do swirls rapidly, causing occult energy to pour from it. You cast a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Eldritch Wrath] spell.
